question: You have been offered a scholarship for obtaining a distance Master's degree through distance learning at a prestigious university. One of the requirements is to take a test on site once a month.Write a letter to your current employer.In your letter:•    Share the news.•    Explain how this will be helpful.•    Ask for permission to be absent.Write at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear …………..,
text: I am writing to request a day of absence from work next week on the 5th of August, as I need to take an important test.

I finished my master's degree in Education through distance learning at the University of Hong Kong.  Due to my high performance and academic achievement in the field I was offered a scholarship as a reward for my success. To obtain it, I am required to take a test on campus once a month starting next.

I am sorry for the short notice regarding my leave of absence, I have already informed the human resource department of the requirements for my scholarship and the reason for my absents. Furthermore, I have appointed Mr Real to be in charge and handle any problems when on days I am not in the office. This has been exciting news for my family and I hope you will approve my leave.
Thank you very much for your kind consideration, I hope to hear from you soon.
